I'm interested in identifying better ways to leverage the technology throughout the organization by centralizing the resources available to each department.  Does anyone have models or programs they use to document the different technology used in the organization?  Also, how do you encourage departments to report the technology they use?   
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
title: Leveraging Technology in the Organization
